item.title: Report X-2025051323
item.description:
Report X-2025051323

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-01
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 5/1/2025 at approximately 0800, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 457903 at the ramp facility in Boise, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of one fiberboard box containing 4 plastic containers, one of which spilled. Further investigation revealed the commodity as Mil-X disinfectant cleaner. Dangerous Goods Administration obtained a safety data sheet that classified the product as UN1760. Per the agent, the shipment did not have the required markings, labeling, packaging, and paperwork, in accordance with IATA Regulations. The shipment is being, pending an investigation by the FAA.

item.title: Report E-2025050030
item.description:
Report E-2025050030

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-03
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1350ET, XPO-UBI notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 1 teaspoon of caustic soda pearls sodium hydroxide released from a plastic bag due to an unknown cause. The release impacted inside trailer#317-8030. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined contractors' assistance would be necessary due to the corrosive nature of the product but was denied and the SCM, approved of the terminal staff cleaning this up. 232768-1 35-gallon poly drum - shrink-wrap, impacted bag, product.
